name: PriceOracle
description: Price oracle contract. Proxy function for getting the rate data using StdReferemce's getReferenceData function. Contract to get price data from Band StdReference oracle contract.

functionDecorators.name: getPrice
functionDecorators.description: Get the conversion rate between two tokens/currencies. Returns the conversion rate between base_symbol and quote_symbol, multiplied by 1e18.
